ratings.question_text: Overall, how would you rate the workload of this course in comparison to other Yale courses you have taken?
What is your overall assessment of this course?
Do you expect to use this class for credit toward your major, or toward a pre-professional program?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize ECON 110 05 for a fellow student? Would you recommend ECON 110 05 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I highly recommend going this route towards the senior essay requirement if you have done some of the work for it ahead of time. Do not wait until the semester of to start thinking about your thesis. Start brainstorming early and do as much research as you can the summer before - the semester is a lot shorter than you think and you have to do a lot of legwork if you want to do well.

If you are willing to be self-directed, take this course. You get as much as you put into it. Make sure that you have a topic that will really pull you along through the semester. Without one, it might be better to write your essay in a seminar.
